param.name: robot_description
param.command: $(find-pkg-share xacro)/xacro '$(var model)' mav_name:=$(var mav_name) gazebo_namespace:=$(var gazebo_namespace)/gazebo robot_namespace:=$(var robot_namespace)

node.name: spawn_$(var mav_name)
node.args: -param robot_description -urdf -x $(var x) -y $(var y) -z $(var z) -Y $(var yaw) -gazebo_namespace $(var gazebo_namespace)/gazebo -robot_namespace $(var robot_namespace) -model $(var mav_name)
